reviewText: Don't wait until your daughter is 13 to get this video. Start her day 1 with Bill's advice. Teaches common sense biomechanics.
Bill Hillhouse is awesome and this DVD is great! Really breaks down each step of the pitching process and is helping my daughter tremendously! Highly Recommend!

If you want a DVD to get your girl started on a fundamentally sound path to becoming a pitcher or just to tweak problems with her existing motion, this is the DVD for you.  I wish we had this when my girl first started her pitching career!
